trigger.expression: {Template - System Resources by Processes:ext_process.network[ESTAB,all].last(0)}>{$ESTAB_LIMIT} & {Template - System Resources by Processes:ext_process.network[ESTAB,all].last(#2)}>{$ESTAB_LIMIT} & {Template - System Resources by Processes:ext_process.network[ESTAB,all].last(#3)}>{$ESTAB_LIMIT}
trigger.name: Too many ESTAB connections on {HOSTNAME}

trigger.expression: {Template - System Resources by Processes:ext_process.network[TIME-WAIT,all].last(0)}>{$TIMEWAIT_LIMIT} & {Template - System Resources by Processes:ext_process.network[TIME-WAIT,all].last(#2)}>{$TIMEWAIT_LIMIT} & {Template - System Resources by Processes:ext_process.network[TIME-WAIT,all].last(#3)}>{$TIMEWAIT_LIMIT}
trigger.name: Too many TIME-WAIT connections on {HOSTNAME}
